subject: Robberies and Thefts
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan track and field board urged the government to protect athletes after the home of the Olympic marathon champion Samuel Wanjiru was robbed. Over the weekend, armed robbers raided Wanjiru’s rural home in Nyahururu, about 120 miles north of Nairobi and demanded his prize money, but no one was hurt.
